attributes.action: Oil and gas price link to be broken
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becomming more and more apparent that the price link between oil and gas is not justified.  It may not even be legal.  The succesive Governments have not built enough storage for gas, and now, we, the consumer, must pay for their short-sightedness.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
